name: 劉世芸
objective: 本課程係以提高學生新聞英文閱聽能力為主， 使得學生能廣泛熟悉各類新聞媒介的文章專論. 學生將建立各領域的常用/專用字彙, 了解分析寫作風格與技巧, 並增強聽力能力.  透過日日變化更新的世界時事, 學習英文將是切身相關, 生動活潑的經驗.  除了英語能力提升或知識增長豐富之外, 更可以奠定未來繼續獨立學習的基礎. 教學材料來源取材自China Post, Time, Newsweek, CNN, 民視英語新聞等新聞媒體。
schedule:
1. orientation
2. journalism and media format
3. writing style and skills 
4. reading of weekly events (1)
5. analysis and report (headings)
6. reading of weekly events (2)
7. analysis and report (columns and commentary)
8. presentation and discussion
9.      mid-term exam
10. reading of weekly events on CNN (1)
11. analysis and report (breaking news) 
12. reading of weekly events on the Internet News (2)
13. analysis and report
14. reading of weekly events on CNN (3)
15. reading of weekly events on Time (4)
16. analysis of weekly events
17. presentation and discussion
18.      Final exam
scorePolicy:
class attendance & performance 10%
tests and quizzes 50%
mid-term exam 20%
final-exam 20%
